Comment: Just a reminder that no social security will result in people dying on our streets destitute and starving. There won't be medical care and housing.   This won't happen behind closed doors because there won't be places that take them for free.   The American dream is not a multi-generational home. This society is not set up for a sudden drop in elderly and special needs care and putting that onto families.   What's the percentage living paycheck to paycheck? How many have parents that they'll now need to take care of? Because not taking care of them will be the end.   The grossest part is this is going to be another massive gain for the rich and drive the wealth gap even further as people take on family care and costs that will act as basically an incredible regressive tax burden as most people can't afford it and barely affecting the multi/hundred millionaires and billionaires.   A slow withering of the SSA allows for people to adapt to the changes. I'm 38 and never expected benefits, but a slow burn out. If the SSA drops within even a couple years, the impact is going to be catastrophic

Comment: After decades of neglecting to codify Roe v Wade into law, refusing to play hardball about Merrick Garland, constantly trying to "turn the other cheek" and "play the high ground" as the GOP lied and cheated their way into power, RBG riding her post to her grave, Pelosi sabotaging AOC's campaign to help install a -literally cancerous- 74 year old who retired 4 months later?   After January 6 there should've been immediate trials for treason, Trump and his cronies thrown into prison, and a major investigation into why the intelligence community didn't warn about it or prepare better for it.  No. It's not satire. It's acknowledging that the DNC has left millions of Americans lacking faith in them. Every single election was the "most important election of our lives."   When they won they'd screw around and fail to deliver on almost any of their promises, even in times of majority. When they'd lose they'd have donation links in your email inbox the next morning.    They abandoned queer people, people who are against genocide, and people who wanted a Green New Deal in favor of a legacy relic who couldn't string a coherent sentence together and did NOTHING to raise up a new generation of leaders, in favor of the same Schumer-and-Pelosi flavored trash we've been getting for decades.  Don't you dare try to scold me about how bad fascism is. I'm a trans person and I've had so many "Vote Blue No Matter Who" people telling me I deserved to go to Trump's concentration camps when I expressed that I didn't like Biden. Take off the blinders and accept that the DNC fumbled the ball at nearly every step for numerous election cycles.
